channel.title: Npc rotation [317]
channel.description:
hi, i havent been making any progress with any of these topics i made for this subject. this maybe like my 50th time asking. All i need to know is how to rotate an npc on a 317 Delta.(dont be hating im kinda new)
now, if there is any way i can do this, please post. I mean, if this is impossiblle.. please tell me!
BTW if you can do this on a 508 or higher tell me. i will switch.

item.title: Npc rotation [317]
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

You have to write two shorts to the client at the end of the npc update block. I don’t know how your server updates though so I can’t spoon feed you.

Read full topic
